item.title: 整理: State
item.description: newtype State s a = State {runState :: s -> (a , s)} newtype (State s) a = State {runState :: s -> (a , s)} -- runState :: State s a -> s -> (a , s) instance Functor (State s) where fmap f m = State $ \s -> case runState m s of (r , s) -> (f r , s) 类型推导 f :: a -> b m :: (State s) a runState :: State s a -> s -> (a , s) runState :: (State s) a -> (s -> (a , s)) runState m s = runState ((State s) a) s = (a , s) = (r , s) \s -> (f r , s) :: \s -> ((a -> b) a , s) :: \s -> (b , s) State $ s -> (b , s) instance Applicative (State s) where pure x = State $ \s -> (x , s) m <*> n = State $ \s -> case runState m s of (f , s') -> case runState n s' of (x , s‘’) -> (f x , s'') 类型推导 pure x :: (State s) x State $ \s -> (x , s) :: (State s) x <*> :: f (a -> b) -> f a -> f b <*> :: (State s) (a -> b) -> (State s) a -> (State s) b m :: (State s) (a -> b) :: (State s) a -> (State s) b n :: (State s) a runState n s' = (x , s'') :: (State s) a -> s -> (a , s) runState m s = (f , s') -> (f x , s'') :: (State s) (a -> b) -> s -> (a , s) -> (b , s)

item.title: 整理: map,action,application
item.description: Functor Functors: uniform action over a parameterized type 在「参数化的type」上的「一致action」 在「列表」上的「map函数」的一般化 Functor: 可被map-over的types的class “对type 可被action做map 的形容” fmap (f . g) == fmap f . fmap g (<$>) -- fmap (<&>) -- flip fmap Applicative a functor with application 对type 可被 有sequential application的uniform action 做map 的形容 fmap f x = pure f <*> x fmap f x = <*> (pure f) x -- f :: a -> b -- pure f :: Applicative (a -> b)
